title: The First Presidential Debate
description: Recap and analysis of the first Presidential debate, held Monday September 26 at Hofstra University in New York. This episode: host/campaign reporter Sam Sanders, White House correspondent Tamara Keith, political reporter Danielle Kurtzleben, and editor/correspondent Ron Evling. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
